title: U.S.-Iran Pistachio War, China’s ‘Big Sickness’ Problem
itunes:title: U.S.-Iran Pistachio War, China’s ‘Big Sickness’ Problem
description:
Dr. Jennifer Nuzzo, Senior Scholar at the Johns Hopkins Center for Health Security, discusses the spread of the coronavirus. Dr. Jalal Bagherli, CEO at Dialog Semiconductor, talks about acquisitions aimed at creating a broader presence in the internet of things sector. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Senior Reporter for International Affairs Marc Champion break down the U.S-Iran pistachio war. Bloomberg New Economy Editorial Director Andy Browne walks through China’s ‘Big Sickness’ Problem. And we Drive to the Close with Randy Watts, Chief Investment Strategist at William O'Neil + Company.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway. 


See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
